sentences.en: AI - Neither friends nor enemies charge blindly into the fray.
sentences.cn: 艾非友非敌,盲目负责的旋涡.

sentences.en: Benjamin Robins then entered the fray with articles and a book.
sentences.cn: 而后,BenjaminRobins以他的几篇专论和一本书参加争论.

sentences.en: Fray's forehead was wrinkled both perpendicularly and crosswise.
sentences.cn: 弗雷的前额上纹路纵横.

sentences.en: GM's strategy of offering a multiplicity of brands started to fray.
sentences.cn: 通用汽车用不同档次多种品牌“抱团”打天下的策略也开始受挫.

sentences.en: He had frayed the bottom of his jeans.
sentences.cn: 他的牛仔裤裤脚已经磨破了。

sentences.en: He is raring to charge into the fray and lay down the law.
sentences.cn: 他急切地想管管这场闹剧，教训他们一顿。

sentences.en: He would be inspiring young people to get into the political fray.
sentences.cn: 他会激励年轻人投身政治战斗。

sentences.en: Her washing machine tends to fray edges on intricate designs.
sentences.cn: 她的洗衣机经常会把织物上的一些复杂图案的边缘磨坏。

sentences.en: I always listen first. And then, inevitably, I join the fray.
sentences.cn: 我总是先听听别人说什么然后不可避免地会加入讨论中去.

sentences.en: My fingers itch for a fray.
Nerves / Tempers began to fray in the heat.
sentences.cn: 天热的时候人就容易神经紧张[脾气急躁].

sentences.en: She encouraged the hospitable impulse and promised in advance to hurl herself into the fray.
sentences.cn: 她赞赏这种殷勤好客的热诚,而且先行表示,她一定要痛痛快快玩一下.

sentences.en: Tempers began to fray as the two teams failed to score.
sentences.cn: 随着两队都没能破门得分，大家渐渐沉不住气了。

sentences.en: The collar had started to fray on Ed’s coat.
sentences.cn: 埃德外套的领子开始出现了磨损。

sentences.en: The fabric is very fine or frays easily.
sentences.cn: 这种布料很细，或者说是容易磨损。

sentences.en: The stitching had begun to fray at the edges.
sentences.cn: 边沿上的针脚已经开始磨损了。

sentences.en: This kind of living was beginning to fray her nerves.
sentences.cn: 这种生活开始让她神经紧张。

sentences.en: Three civilians were injured during the fray.
sentences.cn: 三个平民在冲突中受伤。

sentences.en: Tu Wei - yueh and Chien Pao - sheng had both been injured in the fray.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳 和 钱葆生 都在混乱中受了伤.

words.tran_cn: 使磨损；变得令人紧张、急躁
